law.catch_line: On or before October 1 of each year, the Department shall submit, to the Administrative, Executive, ...
law.text: On or before October 1 of each year, the Department shall submit, to the Administrative, Executive, and Legislative Review Committee for the Committee's review, a list and summary of all changes to the California motor vehicle emissions standards and compliance requirements proposed or adopted by the California Air Resources Board in the prior 12 months.
